data.persona: I am a countess.  I am the cousin of the king.  I wish I was ruler.
data.description:
You are in the Castle Royal tower.
A stone parapet at the top of the castle, the royal tower is what makes this castle a fortress. The walls are stone and dinged with souvenirs of past battles. It is cold and gray, but the perfect vantage point for soldiers. The wind whistles through the cracks in the wall. Straw litters the floor.
The soldier is here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a shoes and a fancy dress.

data.short_motivation: I will hit the soldier and take his weapons and his royal emblem.
data.mid_motivation: Once I have weapons and the royal emblem I will start a revolt against the King.
data.long_motivation: I wish to become Queen of the kingdom and rule over the townsfolk.
